rows.label: tev025801_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev025801_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Yolanda what she's doing here.

rows.label: tev025801_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev025801_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Yolanda if she's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev025801_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Yolanda if she's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev025801_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Yolanda about recent developments.

rows.label: tev025801_MSG0001
rows.name: What does it look like?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025801_MSG0002
rows.name:
We're having ourselves a little chitchat over drinks
and poker. Trying to figure out how we're gonna make
fat coin on our next mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025801_MSG0003
rows.name: You got a problem with that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025801_MSG0004
rows.name:
Don't get the quaint idea that everyone in BLADE is
some brainless sheep in Nagi and Vandham's flock.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025801_MSG0005
rows.name:
Tomorrow we might all be dead, so anyone who's not
milking the moment for every sinful pleasure it's worth
is a class-A chump.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025801_MSG0010
rows.name: Haven't seen you around here before. You a rookie?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025801_MSG0011
rows.name: Well, let me give you a piece of advice...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025801_MSG0012
rows.name:
If you run into a blonde bombshell with daggers in
her eyes, steer clear![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025801_MSG0013
rows.name:
If you even look at her cross-eyed...KSSSSSSSSHK!
Right in the gut. Trust me. Happens every day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025801_MSG0018
rows.name: Hey, you want a little tip? Course you do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025801_MSG0019
rows.name: Watch your back around the Murderess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025801_MSG0020
rows.name:
She's taken out a bunch of BLADEs already.
And I don't mean on dates. Ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025801_MSG0021
rows.name:
Some got it from behind. Some got it in their sleep.
Some got it at camp. But they all got the same thing...
A flash of steel and KSSSSSSSSHK![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025801_MSG0022
rows.name:
You think she's friendly just because she's a BLADE?
Ha! Just keep your wits about you if you plan on
hanging on to all your other parts, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025801_MSG0027
rows.name:
You should keep your pretty little lips shut, girl.
How is a reputable woman supposed to conduct
business with you blabbing away?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025801_MSG0028
rows.name:
Be careful who you cross, or someone might come
along and cross YOU out![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025801_MSG0029
rows.name:
Wait, you mean you know each other? ...Huh.
Well, that was dumb of me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025801_MSG0030
rows.name:
Er, let me revise my statement: "The Murderess is a
capable and upstanding Curator, and not actually a
cold-blooded killer." ...Better?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025801_MSG0031
rows.name:
Better. Not great, but better. In the meantime,
make sure I'm the first to be apprised of any lucrative
opportunities, all right? Thanks, sweetie.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025801_MSG1001
rows.name:
Did you know that you're the subject of everyone's
favorite wager around here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025801_MSG1002
rows.name:
We're placing bets on how long you can stay mixed
up with the Murderess and survive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025801_MSG1003
rows.name:
My money's on "not long," so do a gal a favor and
get stuck like a pig sometime soon, yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025801_MSG1009
rows.name: Hey, that sounds intriguing. Can I place a bet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025801_MSG1010
rows.name:
How is that fair?! You'd set the date and time,
then knife the poor [ST:gender p1=guy p2=girl ] right on schedule![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev025801_MSG1011
rows.name:
Oh, but that's not who I was going to bet against.
...Oh well! Enjoy your game, ladies![ST:wait ]
